## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand with a buffer,  ensure stock availability over the next 5 days, and potentially qualify for a discount on the next order. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 5,000 units higher than player's plan.    |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3.5 days                                  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5.6 days                                  |
| Comments                          | Ordering 20,000 units allows for a 20% discount on the next purchase, provided the minimum purchase quantity is met.  This will save on future costs. |
